register-data.comment:
delay with correction factor to compute the phase wrt to the FTWH1 for IQ phase rotator.
Format: Fix28_4 (internal)
correction factor: f_clk*1e-3*H=577.5 f_clk=125 [MHz] H=4630
Delay resolution : 0.125ns Max delay : 4095.875ns Max register value: 4095.875*577.5*2^4 = +/-37845885
register-data.description: delay for automatic delay compensation (phase rotator)
register-data.name: delay

register-data.comment:
delay with correction factor to compute the phase wrt to the FTWH1 for IQ phase rotator.
Format: Fix_32_4
correction factor: f_clk*1e-3*H=577.5 f_clk=125 [MHz] H=4630
register-data.description: phase offset for automatic delay compensation (phase rotator)
register-data.name: phaseOffset

register-data.comment:
Static gain correction applied by the phase rotator. Used to calibrate small gain error from output stage and Power amplifier
Range [-2;+2[ Format: Fix_16_14
register-data.description: IQ gain applied with the automatic delay compensation (phase rotator)
register-data.name: gain
